text:
Watches were stolen from a prominent store here.

The watch showroom of Titan, located within the premises of the company near SIPCOT, was running a discount sale for the past few days. A vast collection of watches were part of the mega sale that was underway at the showroom. However on Sunday, watches worth Rs. 1.20 lakh had gone missing from the shop. Based on a complaint, Hosur police are investigating.
title: Shop burgled
